lore: A headstrong young vastaya of the seas, Nami was the first of the Marai tribe to leave the waves and venture onto dry land, when their ancient accord with the Targonians was broken. With no other option, she took it upon herself to complete the sacred ritual that would ensure the safety of her people. Amidst the chaos of this new age, Nami faces an uncertain future with grit and determination, using her Tidecaller staff to summon the strength of the oceans themselves.
title: the Tidecaller
blurb: A headstrong young vastaya of the seas, Nami was the first of the Marai tribe to leave the waves and venture onto dry land, when their ancient accord with the Targonians was broken. With no other option, she took it upon herself to complete the sacred...
allytips: Aqua Prison has a long cooldown, make sure to use it at the right moment.
Using Ebb and Flow during an engagement with enemy champions will help sway the battle in your favor.
Nami's ultimate can come in very handy for initiating on enemies who are far away.

passive.name: Surging Tides
passive.description: When Nami's abilities hit allied champions they gain Movement Speed for a short duration.
passive.sanitizedDescription: When Nami's abilities hit allied champions they gain Movement Speed for a short duration.

enemytips: Aqua Prison is a very powerful ability with a long cooldown, take advantage of the situation if Nami misses this ability.
Tidal Wave has a very long range but travels slowly, be aware of when it is coming your way as you can move out of its path.
Try to avoid fighting an opponent affected by Tidecaller's Blessing, it lasts a short duration so waiting it out can help you greatly.
name: Nami

spells.name: Aqua Prison
spells.description: Sends a bubble to a target area, dealing damage and stunning all enemies on impact.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Sends a bubble to a target area, dealing damage and stunning all enemies on impact.
spells.tooltip: Sends a bubble to target area, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies, and stunning them for {{ e2 }} seconds.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Sends a bubble to target area, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies, and stunning them for {{ e2 }} seconds.

spells.name: Ebb and Flow
spells.description: Unleashes a stream of water that bounces back and forth between allied and enemy champions, healing allies and damaging enemies.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Unleashes a stream of water that bounces back and forth between allied and enemy champions, healing allies and damaging enemies.
spells.tooltip:
Unleashes a stream of water that bounces back and forth between allied and enemy champions.

On Ally Hit: Heals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) Health and will bounce to a nearby enemy champion.

On Enemy Hit: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and bounces to a nearby allied champion.

Bounces to each target only once, and hits up to {{ e2 }} targets. The damage and healing value is modified by ({{ f1 }}%) each bounce.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Unleashes a stream of water that bounces back and forth between allied and enemy champions. On Ally Hit: Heals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) Health and will bounce to a nearby enemy champion. On Enemy Hit: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and bounces to a nearby allied champion. Bounces to each target only once, and hits up to {{ e2 }} targets. The damage and healing value is modified by ({{ f1 }}%) each bounce.

spells.name: Tidecaller's Blessing
spells.description: Empowers an allied champion for a short duration. The ally's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and slow the target.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Empowers an allied champion for a short duration. The ally's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and slow the target.
spells.tooltip: Empowers an allied champion's next {{ e4 }} basic attacks, causing them to slow the target by {{ e2 }}% (+{{ a2 }}%) for {{ e3 }} second and deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus magic damage. Lasts for {{ e5 }} seconds.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Empowers an allied champion's next {{ e4 }} basic attacks, causing them to slow the target by {{ e2 }}% (+{{ a2 }}%) for {{ e3 }} second and deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus magic damage. Lasts for {{ e5 }} seconds.

spells.name: Tidal Wave
spells.description: Summons a massive Tidal Wave that knocks up, slows, and damages enemies. Allies hit gain double the effect of Surging Tides.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Summons a massive Tidal Wave that knocks up, slows, and damages enemies. Allies hit gain double the effect of Surging Tides.
spells.tooltip:
Summons a Tidal Wave from Nami's position. The wave knocks up enemies and slows them by {{ e4 }}%, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. The duration of the slow increases based on how far the Tidal Wave has traveled, with a minimum duration of {{ e3 }} seconds and a maximum of {{ e5 }} seconds.

Allies hit by the wave gain double the effect of Surging Tides.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Summons a Tidal Wave from Nami's position. The wave knocks up enemies and slows them by {{ e4 }}%, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. The duration of the slow increases based on how far the Tidal Wave has traveled, with a minimum duration of {{ e3 }} seconds and a maximum of {{ e5 }} seconds. Allies hit by the wave gain double the effect of Surging Tides.
